channel.title: Alabama on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Alabama on A Hugo website

item.title: Mark Few won the Naismith Coach of the Year award, was he the clear cut favorite?
Was Mark Few trhe clear cut favorite to win the Naismith Coach of the Year award?
item.description: The College Basketball season after for the first time in NCAA history where the March Madness tournament was canceled. Teams suffered from losing the postseason play like the Dayton Flyers who seemed to be a possible one seed lead by former player Obi Toppin. This season was different. These teams wanted to continue the path they have laid out for them in the previous season. None of the basketball teams could do this without their head coach.

item.title: Who deserved the NCAA Coach of the year in the 2020-2021 College Basketball season?
item.description: The College Basketball season after for the first time in NCAA history where the March Madness tournament was canceled. Teams suffered from losing the postseason play like the Dayton Flyers who seemed to be a possible one seed lead by former player Obi Toppin. This season was different. These teams wanted to continue the path they have laid out for them in the previous season. None of the basketball teams could do this without their head coach.
